name: Borrowed Time (itch) (2linescrossed, Osprie, VoidAwake, Tofuuu)
description:
A Game for the Adaptive Game Jam (September 2021).

You are a wanderer through time and space, on the run from beings intent on pursuing you, no matter the time period or reality. 

It's time to make a last stand against insurmountable odds. Use a variety of weapons to defend yourself against them and see how long you can survive. And when you're in trouble... rewind time in your favour. 

A Game by Cross, Nalax, Autic, donna, Osprie and Tofu

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Q to Swap Weapon

Spacebar to Dodge

Right Click to Reverse Time

Left Click to attack. 

Music Credits:
